name: Nudies Matte + Glow Core All Over Face Plumping Peptide Blush
about: What it is:An all-over-face natural blush formulated with skin-loving ceramides and plumping peptides for an inner-glow dewiness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Peptides: Visibly plump, nourish, and reduce the appearance of wrinkles..Ingredient Callouts:It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This is an innovative cream makeup stick made of an outer blush and inner-glow cream core. The outer core is Nudies matte cream blush color, and the inner core is a Nudies glow skin brightening balm with plumping peptides for instant dewiness. Its formulated with juicy ceramides and visibly plumping peptides and light diffusing minerals to soften the appearance of texture.
ingredients: -Peptides: Visibly plump, nourish, and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. .-Ceramides: Protect the skins lipid barrier and reduce dry skin by sealing in moisture..-Vitamin E: Natural antioxidant....Diisostearyl Malate, Dimethicone, Polybutene, Synthetic Wax, Caprylyl Methicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Triethylhexanoin, Magnesium/Potassium/Silicon/Fluoride/Hydroxide/Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mica, Ceresin, Phenoxyethanol, Octyldodecanol, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopherol, Microcrystalline Wax, Silica, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Glycerin, Tin Oxide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ceramide Np, Phytosphingosine, Propylene Carbonate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1 .[+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)]..**This shade is approved globally for use on the eye area, except for the USA. Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For an easy, minimalist monochromatic nude blush glow or face sculpt, apply cream blush to cheeks, eyes, and lips. .-Apply color with stick, fingers, or brush directly to skin to build and blend.

reviews.review_title: Creamy and pigmented, disappears a little
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do really love the creaminess of this blush on my dry skin, however you have to be careful of how you blend it. Dont be excessive when blending because it can disappear and I have to apply more. Beautiful blush though, I would opt to pair this with a powder blush. apaplly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this with a beauty blender as it's very pigmented (hoping this will also save product so I get my money's worth). I have an ultra pale and cool undertone, so was a little wary of the gold center in the pink ice shade. It leans almost warm on me but still manages to look like a natural flush. I've only used it on top of concealer with primer and fixing spray so far, but I find it wears beautifully. This was my first Nudestix product, and though I wouldn't say it's worth $30, I'm happy with it!

reviews.review_text: This is a stunning color.  So vibrant. It's not really glowy despite the highlight in the middle. It's a good cream blush.  This packaging is incredibly cheap though.  Very thin plastic. For $30 it's just not worth the price with the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush in exchange for my honest opinion, but I truly really like it! It packs a punch with colour but is super glowy at the same time! It kind of reminds me of the Charlotte Tilbury wands in a way. I love this shade Pink Ice, it's the perfect pink shade - not too cool not too warm toned. Instead of applying it directly to my face, I rubbed some on the back of my hand and went in with a brush so I could control the application, highly recommend trying your blushes this way if they come off as 'too much' on your face. Oh and it also lasts well on my face which is great, as I sometimes struggle with my blush disappearing throughout the day.

reviews.review_text: Beautiful product! I bought this product in Rose Glow after a positive review from Morgan Turner on YouTube. For reference, I have cool-tone fair skin and red hair with combo skin, and I dont like super balmy face products because I live in the humid south. I also apply products to the back of my hand and then apply by brush to my face for even application. The product in this shade is fragrance free, soft and creamy, not at all greasy or balmy, and dries down well when applied to the skin. I thought the color was a nice neutral with a soft glow that suited my skin tone and the product seemed to wear/last decently. I dont like gold highlights and the highlight in Rose Glow is a nice silver/neutral base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am already a fan of NUDESTIX, so I was excited to try this stunning and multi-use Nudies Matte + Glow Core Blush Stick in Magenta. I am absolutely obsessed with it! This blush stick is everything, and let me tell you, my makeup game has been looking so much better since I incorporated this multi-tasking matte cream blush stick with an innovative juicy glow core into my routine! It's not only a blush, but it can also be used on your lips and eyes! I love that it is versatile, buildable and a stunning shade. I have used it every day for the past two weeks and my blush stays all day. I love that it is both matte and provides a dewy glow thanks to the juicy center containing ceramides and peptides. Lastly, I love that it is cruelty-free, vegan, synthetic fragrance-free (yay, no headaches!) formulated without parabens or phthalates and the packaging is eco-friendly. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix is by far my favourite brand for cream products, especially if you are a beginner or have a hard time finding shades that compliment extremely fair skin tones. The formula is a dream and blends like butter. My favourite thing about it is that the perfect amount of product is left on your face after blending it out. Theres not too much and not too little- giving a completely natural u201cblush from withinu201d finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the idea of a blush stick to avoid the mess of powdered blush. I had originally thought I wouldnt need a makeup brush either with this product but I recommend using one to help spread out the color evenly. I like the product but beware that the color is highly pigmented. A little goes a long way. I think this particular shade was a little harsh for my pale coloring so I would like to try a lighter, softer shade in the future. Good product overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always used powdered blush before receiving this as a free sample! I have now switcher to using cream blush and will never switch back again!!! the way this glides on and blends into my makeup is absolutely flawless!!! I love everything about this to the point that once my sample was finished, I had to go buy a new one! I even ended up buying it in 2 different shades! I love it so much and am so happy that I was able to try it. Otherwise, I would still be using powdered blush until today!

reviews.review_text: I dont normally use blush products; however, I was pleased with the results and application of this Nudestid blush. I found that it was very easy to apply either directly from the product to the skin or with a brush or even your fingers for a lighter touch. Ive been having some skin flaking lately due to skin treatments Ive been using so I also mixed this with some skin oil and it worked quite well at providing a smooth application with good blending. The Rose Glow shade is also beautiful in medium to tan skin.

I think if the glow core was more noticeable (I can't see it on my cheeks or eyes) it might help. I'm debating returning..  off to continue my hunt for a good blush/eye look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush. I don't have to put much product on my cheeks because it has very good pigment. This product should last me for a good while which is nice. It's also very easy to blend.

reviews.review_title: Soft, easy to apply, face brightening
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush stick was very easy to apply, and I enjoyed how creamy it was, especially because I have dry skin.   I used this on on my bare skin and it really helped to brighten up my face. Because it has such a nice, soft texture, I know it will be easy to apply on top of foundation, without rubbing it off, unlike a gel stick blush.   To apply, I dotted it on my cheek area and tapped to blend. I liked that I didn't have to rub.  Even though this shade is described as cool-toned, I found it could go either way. And even though it looks very bright in the tube, it looked very natural once applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush was so much more pigmented than I thought it was going to be!! It also felt really nice on my skin - not too heavy or too light. The shimmer is a nice touch too! I dont know how much Ill be using it in my routine because I find the colour a little dark for me but would love to try the other colors to see if that makes a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite blushes of the year. the color is very beautiful and the application is very easy. I used rare beauty before and i found this one better at not smudging anywhere you don't want it to go and at staying longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very easy to use. this is very pigmented and easy to work with. This is very pretty shade and  looked so beautiful. It is very easy to build the coverage. This only withdraw i found was no blended brush included in this product. I will defo repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product for free as part of the BzzAgent program from Nudestix in exchange for writing that review.   I will be separating my review in three parts ; packaging, ingredients and performance.   1. Packaging :  First, the little plastic box is biodegredable. Also, I like that you can roll the bottom of the container up and down to get the product.  Finally, the cap and the product are the same color, so no confusion !  2. Ingredient : I wouldnt use it the lips due to the ingredients even if you can. (lots of silicone and titanium dioxide).   12 months of shelf life is good for a cream product.  It is made in Korea where the skincare is so reputable, so I think its a plus.  The inner core have skincare benefits. They say its good to help with plumpness and hydratation of your skin.  I think the ceramides are too far in the ingredient list to have an impact.    3. Performance : You need to apply it with a sponge, not directly on the skin if you have makeup on or it will disrupt the base and be patchy.   The color payoff is good, but not amazing. The colour doesnt smudge and It doesnt emphasize skin texture like pores, but as the day goes, it fades away  I hate that there are small shimmers in the inner core.    Summarize : So, I think its not the best on the market. I think its a little pricey (34$ CAD for 6g/0.21 oz). There are similar products for a quarter of the price. I think the main selling point of this product is the skincare in it. I would recommend to friends who dont wear foundation so the skincare could have the potential to do something.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!

I do find it hard to get the highlight to actually show up when Im applying it doesnt really seem to come through as much as I want. But still is a good blush overall!!

reviews.review_text: I recently tried Nudies Matte + Glow Core Blush Stick in Peach Pearl, and I must say, I'm impressed! The creamy texture glided on smoothly, giving my cheeks a natural flush. It blended effortlessly with my foundation and lasted throughout the day. Plus, the convenient stick format makes touch-ups a breeze. Overall, it's a fantastic addition to my makeup routine that I will absolutely be purchasing again and recommending to anyone and everyone!

reviews.review_text: Gorgeous colour payoff. Extremely creamy and blends easy- works well with warmth of fingers! Would love o try more shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, and maybe would have if the shade was deeper.  I received Pink Ice which is a cool toned pink.  Unfortunately, the cool tones don't go well with my warm undertones, and the colour was far too light for my deeper skin.  When I would apply and blend with my fingertips, the colour virtually disappeared, leaving behind as slight shimmer and dewiness from the glow core.  I can see how it gives a lit from within look, but would definitely want to see either a heavier pigmentation or wider shade range.  Can't comment on longevity as the colour wasn't apparent to begin with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a stick blush, and wow, its amazing! The colour Sunset Gold is fantastic - one swipe provides a perfect amount of blush. Blending is easy and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never tried a blush stick before, but I loved this! I have tan, neutral skin, and the rose glow shade was perfect for my skin tone. The blush was easy to apply, and blends smoothly while leaving a beautiful glowy finish. The pigment was nice - you can build the pigment and make it as light or dark as you want. I have always used powder, and now I definitely prefer the blush stick because of the dewy finish. The highlight in the middle is a nice feature and mixes in well with the blush. Just wish the highlight was more of a gold shade. If you dont mind the price for a quality product, I would definitely recommend it!  *I received this free product in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a stick blush, and wow, its amazing! The colour payoff is fantastic - one swipe provides a perfect amount of blush. Blending is easy (I just used my fingers!) Since my stick is new, I find the center highlight isnt quite showing up yet (I think if I use the stick some more, itll even out so it all comes off in one swipe). I was hesitant about how this shade looks like a hot pink, but I was pleasantly surprised by how flattering it ended up! I have neutral/cool toned skin (east asian), and this pink actually complemented my skin very nicely when blended. The stick is cute, easy to use, and gives the best Barbie vibes.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my make-up routine!

In fact its so good I had to repurchase it because my daughter discovered I had it and has since claimed it as hers! 0 complaints over here .100% have recommended it to my friends and as well as my daughters friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive tried many and this is my fav cream blush. Goes on easy, blendable with fingertip, stays on all day. Love pop of color with Pink Ice and natural cheek color of Blush Bling. Great for more mature skin, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very lovely colour. Depending on the amount you use on your cheeks, the clour can be more rosy or less. It makes your skin glowy but not too much. I had always used a powder blush so I did not know what to expect, but I can say that I am very impressed with this product and will buy other colours as well. It blends very easily and the glow stays with you all day. Im pleased that I got to try this product. An eye opening experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I must say, I was quite excited to try out the Nudies Matte + Glow Core Blush Stick, and it didn't disappoint! The color of this blush is absolutely lovely, and the added glow is a charming touch. I found that applying it with a brush worked best for me, but once it's on, it's perfect for those days when you want that fresh, dewy look without heavy makeup. The blush adds a natural flush to my cheeks, making my skin look radiant and healthy. It's the ideal choice for a no makeup makeup day when you want to look effortlessly beautiful.  I'm a fan of stick blushes. What I really appreciate is the creamy formula u2013 it leaves my skin feeling soft and pampered. The color is a winner too, giving my cheeks a super pretty and natural tint. Now, some people might expect a noticeable highlight effect, given the name, but  the glow part wasn't very noticeable. It's more like a blush with a subtle shimmer. However, even without the intense highlight, I still think it's a fantastic product overall. It's perfect for achieving that healthy, rosy look with a soft touch, and that's something I really like about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in return for an honest review. The color of this blush is really pretty and great if you want a natural or no makeup makeup look. I also liked the formulation, I think the blush blends out beautifully and lasts the whole day with minimal smudging. I'm giving this a 4/5 because when I first opened it the entire product actually fell out of the tube, it hasn't happened again since but it wasn't a first great impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from bzzagent in exchange for my objective review. This blush is a beautiful colour and the pink/gold combo reminds me of Nars's most popular blush shade. I'm light skinned with cool undertones and the colour looks really natural on me. The formula is pigmented and creamy and it gives me a natural flushed glow. I took away one star because I seem to break out on my cheeks a little after I use it. This could be a coincidence, but acne-prone users may want to take note of this. I would still recommend though because the colour, pigmentation, and blendability are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the formula of this blush it's creamy and soft and pigmented as well.  It glides on skin really good and gives a glowy look. I'd definitely buy and recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this for free in exchange for my review. I was pleasantly surprised. Definitely gives you a glow from within look, not a fake shimmer type. A little goes a long way! You do not need much so start with a little and build up if need be. This colour works very well for olive skin tones. It was my first time using a cream blush as I was always afraid they would mess up my foundation when applying but it did not

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first dub the product on my hand its quite dark but when you blend it it gets lighter. Its not as sparkly which is perfect for work and everyday. I like its doesnt have any scent very neutral and best of all it is moisturizing especially with winter coming my skin gets dry it doesnt sink into the skin it has a flawless finish so my dry patches of my skin doesnt show up . I like how its so easy to use just a stick I dont have to use a make up brush I can just straight apply it on my face and just rub the spot using my fingers . Its multifunction perfect for carry on I hate carrying so much products I just need one item to fit in my pocket  Best of all this brand does not test on animal would recommend it to friends and family I would purchase this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a nice pink!! i love using it! its easy to blend and doesnt lift my foundation! would look so nice on cool toned skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review, I love the colour of this blush and the additional glow is super cute. I did find it easier to apply with a brush but a great product for those glowy no makeup makeup days.
I just received this bush, i think it's a pretty good product. Really pigmented on me and does the job

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice creamy blush - perfect amount of glow. I got this product for free, for the purpose of trying and reviewing.   its a nice creamy blush - applies well with a wet beauty blender. Gives off a good amount of colour, and i dont notice it transfers much. It also doesnt get muddy when i use with a cream bronzer.

reviews.review_title: Love this multi tasking cream blush!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for review and testing purposes in exchange for my honest thoughts and opinions from Bzzagent. So far I really honestly enjoy this product. It is super creamy and blendable and gives the perfect sunkissed glow. The shimmer in the center of the stick isnt super overpowering and blends out very nicely. I like this cream blush and apply it to the apples of my cheeks and the high points of my cheeks.  It says this product is multi tasking so I applied this to my lips and it left my lips with a nice hint of color and also was creamy and non drying on my lips. The color I received is not usually a color I would pick but I actually was suprised once I applied it on my face that it did suit my features really well. The product packaging is nice and sleek, and I like that the plastic box packaging it came in is biodegradable. Overall I would recommend this multi tasking cream blush, I like that it leaves me with a nice pinch of sunkiss to my face and overall leaves me feeling radiant. I will recommend this to my friends and family members and once I run out I would repurchase and try out the other colors. Overall it was a hit in my books!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I think its an okay product. Nothing really stand out to me. I think I received one that may be just be too pink for my skin but i find after kind of blending it I almost dont see it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Nudes Matte + Glow Core Blush Stick in Sunset Gold is a game-changer. I couldn't be more pleased with the results. It established itself as an essential in my everyday makeup collection. The colour Sunset Gold is incredibly gorgeous. The combination of a soft golden highlight and a warm, rosy blush is just right. The effect is a stunning, sun-kissed natural glow that looks great in any season. This colour flawlessly complements my skin tone and lasts hours and can be used for both, day and night looks.  I can create a variety of looks with only one product thanks to its versatility. This blush stick's wonderfully smooth and creamy texture makes it effortless to apply and blend. The clean and contemporary packaging makes it simple to throw into my makeup bag. Additionally, it's simple to touch up as needed during the day without the use of brushes or additional tools.It stands out among blushes and highlights thanks to its gorgeous hue, simple application, long-lasting formula, and adaptable finish. It is absolutely fantastic, and I will most definitely be experimenting with more colours from this range in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ill start by saying Im a huge fan of the nudies blushes and have quite a few in all the different finishes, so I was really excited to give this a try. I received Peach Pearl complementary for review purposes. Its a gorgeous shade thats a deep rosy-coral, rather than a true peach. When applied these give a beautiful glow, but I was a little disappointed that there wasnt more pearly shimmer. To me the finish is not quite different from the look of the nudies bloom. These have slightly less product than original nudies (6g vs 7) and the component is smaller, which I like, because theres no brush on the bottom. Overall Id recommend this product and like that it has added skincare benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: We have received this product for free as a demo from BzzAgent. My wife used this product as I do not wear make up. From the look of the use it appeared to have a natural and flush finish. She mentioned that it was comfortable to wear and lasted all day. Would buy again when it is time to replace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review. Im not normally one to wear blush (stick or powder) so I was really nicely surprised with how well it blended and towel subtle it was

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the glow that the product gives to the cheek, but I found it was MUCH easier applied with a brush. The colour is bright out of the tube, but it settles into the skin nicely for a little pop of colour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the colour Rose Glow. It's pigmented but it blends easy. The shimmer gives you a radiant glow. Nice staple blush to have. My only complaint is that it doesn't last too long on my face. Great packaging, makes it travel friendly. I like that the ingredients are clean as well. Deserves a spot in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This product is great for on the go! Very convenient. This can be used as a blush or a lipstick because the color is so pretty. It gives it a nice shimmer and glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free in exchange for my review. I wasnt sure if this blush would work for me as I usually stick to powder blushes. After using it for a week, I really enjoy this product. You only need a small amount to get good colour on the skin. I like using a beauty blender to blend it out. The colour lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't sure what to expect as I have only ever used powder blush but I love the colour this gave and how easy it was to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The short of it: This is a great blush stick, particularly if you are new to this type of item. It's a sheer wash of colour thanks to the 'glow core', making it difficult to overdo it. It's a very nice finish which minimized texture in my opinion, but just lacks the longevity of a more matte formula. However, the compact size makes it easy to take this on the go with you for touch ups.  A bit more: I love this packaging compared to their other blush sticks as it's more compact and they ditches the useless brush! However, I do find this formula a bit lacking compared to their others, as it's incredibly sheer and not as long-lasting. A few pros/cons in comparison to their other blushes but overall a nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush to review honestly.  Ive been using this blush for a few weeks now and I really like it! At first I wasnt too sure if the colour would work on my darker brown skin tone but it actually looks really pretty! I thought that the glow core was just going to make it look like I mixed glitter in with my blush but its actually gives a very pretty luminous glow while keeping a matte finish which is great from my combination oily skin. It very pigmented but also very easy to blend out so you can build the colour depending on your preference, whether you want just a touch of blush or a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I really love nudestix and I loved that this blush came with a shimmer in it. The colour is perfect for brown skin and it was super easy to blend in. Highly recommend and will be purchasing more colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. Cople things I absolutely love about this product, 1. It is clean, 2. Biodegradable packaging, 3. It DELIVERS! I love this creamy formulation for nicely it glides over the skin, does not move foundation and i super creamy and not dry and uncomfortable. It is highly pigmented and a little goes a long way so it is value for money for sure. I have dry skin but this is so comfortable to wear even without a base, I love the glowy core, and I feel I don't need a highlighter with this. It does not have a fragrance more than subtle. I have no cons about this product. Pick a shade that suits your skin tone and you're good to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of the Nudestix cream blushes and have purchased several in the past. This particular shade was really gorgeousu2014a warm, sunkissed coral that really gives that late summer glow I wanted. I can't say I really experienced much of the plumping or hydrating effects of the inner glow balm because the blush was SO pigmented.  Normally I wouldn't mind a richly-pigmented product, but I would have liked to see a higher ratio of the balmy core to the outer blush to really get a dewy finish on my cheeks.  Regardless, it's a gorgeous colour and long-lasting blush that I'll enjoy using this season.  I love the portability and it's truly multi-use as it looks great on lips as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great multi purpose product. I like that I can use it as blush and also as a lipstick. The colour is such a beautiful shade and it has a bit of a sparkle to it. This is my new go to product, it goes on so smooth and effortlessly and it lasts. I have gotten so many compliments when I use this product. I would recommend this product to family and friends. Give it a try, you won't regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush for free from in exchange of my honest review. I use this blush several times It has a very creamy formula and very is easy to apply and blend.mostly stick blush are very hard to apply,remove your foundation. but its soo good.cant wait to use more shadesud83dude0dud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this adorable multi-use stick. The colour is perfect, I can use a thin layer to add some glow or build on it to give a real pop of colour.   So easy to use and I love the silky smooth application.   I want to try all of the colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how compact and cute this product is! Even with a few dabs it applies a generous amount. When blended it is looks more natural.

reviews.review_title: Creamy blush in the prettiest shade of pink!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush stick is small but mighty! It instantly became one I reach for often. A little bit goes a long way and the smaller size means I can just toss it into my bag for easy touch upsu2026 although it does have great staying power that usually lasts me throughout the day. I apply it directly to my face and use my fingers to blend it in. The formula is smooth, blends well and gives amazing colour payoff with a dewy glow. I have fair skin and the magic magenta shade is gorgeous. A must try for cream blush lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this for free in exchange for my honest review. This blush colour provides for a lovely and healthy glow on my skin. I love how you can blend and also build upon the colour for a simple look. Its creamy! It has a soft colour that is not very pronounced. The packaging is easy to store in your bag or in your purse as a personal item for your travels. There were no difficulties in removing the blush at the end of the day. Lastly, it has multi-uses where you can use it for different looks and receive new results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love stick blushes and this is the second NUDESTIX blush that I tried. I really liked the cream formula as it gave my skin a soft feeling and the color is super pretty too! The only downside that I felt was that it not not result in a noticeable highlight effect. By the looks of it, it seems like a blush and highlight combo but I did not see a noticeable highlight after using. Overall, its still a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is nice and creamy, it's decently concentrated but super easy to blend out and looks natural. I don't wear heavy makeup but I use this usually on days where I have no foundation/skin tint applied but it definitely doesn't stay the whole day. The center highlight gives the perfect amount of dewy look but not sparkly at all which is great. I love that it's multipurpose, it looks gorgeous on lips as well. My only complaint is the Peach Pearl colour is in my opinion VERY baby pink, I was hoping for something a little more neutral/less pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this blush, it is so creamy and bendable. It is very easy to apply, it goes on smooth with either a finger or brush, and buildable to create the coverage you want. The color is also amazing! Very dewy on the skin and creates a gorgeous glow. It is very compact so I could easily carry it anywhere I go.

reviews.review_title: Great addition to my makeup routine!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good and so affordable! I just got into makeup and this was a nice addition to my makeup collection which isn't that much to be honest ahaha. This matte is so rich when used as a finishing touch to your makeup. A little goes a long way. I use it to add some colour to my cheekbones and have gotten a lot of compliments from my girlfriends. I would say that this product is worth the money. I'm officially adding this matte to my makeup routine from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a fan of the Nudestix matte blushes and highlighters, and would often use them together. So I was excited when they came out with this blush that has them pre-combined! Its pigmented and buildable, while still being very blendable, and the highlight is not at all glittery. It also works great on eyes and lips. Ive added it to my daily makeup rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is definitely going into my collection. Though I have a neutral complexion, I always get a rose gold blush since I believe it looks best on me. This kind of blush certainly raises the bar. It has a matte finish and is very creamy and easy to apply.  My cheeks appear plumper and more glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the nudestix cream formulas! They're so creamy and easily bendable! I was sent the shade ice pink for free in exchange for my honest review. Ice pink is a beautiful cool toned pink (although it works well for my warm toned skin) with a gold shimmer in the middle. This is pretty creamy, I find that i'm not afraid to glide it on my face directly, as it doesn't lift up any makeup underneath. I prefer to blend it in with my fingers by lightly tapping on the edges. The formula is not too emollient or too dry.  I've even applied it on top of powder a few times and it didn't look patchy. I will typically set it with a powder blush after and I've found that I didn't need to retouch my blush throughout the day.The stick is very compact and easy to take on the go! I also think the price is very fair, its not a whopping $45 dollar for a blush. Overall, very impressed and really open to trying more from their brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy application and convenient packaging that allows for you to throw it in your bag for quick and easy touch ups. Silky smooth texture and a beautiful colour that isn't too bold or bright but gives a nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my honest review.  I love a product that serves multiple purposes and this one did not disappoint. The colour is lovely and the application is smooth and simple. I like that the glow is quite subtle with the colour. It comes off fairly easily at the end of the day. Perfect for on the go!

reviews.review_title: Great formula but colour isn't for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been obsessed with cream blushes lately and this one is no exception. The formula is buildable and easily blended in with the rest of my makeup. However, this particular shade is unfortunately rather unflattering on me. I think this would look much nicer with a darker skin tone, I'm very pale and the bright magenta makes me look kind of doll like - and not in a good way. I do think if I had another shade I would feel more comfortable giving this full stars. Bonus points for Nudestix for being clean and cruelty free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not one to use blush but once I tried this , I immediately fell in love. Ibrahim tried various other blush and powder and by far this is my favourite!   The colour is so pretty and complements to my tanned skin. The dewy glow that I get after application is so beautiful and flawless. Its so simple to use, a swipe and blend with my fingers, given that is a cream blush, I dont even use any brushes. The shimmer part is so subtle and nice as well. I use it as eyeshadow and on top of foundation, so quick and easy! Can you tell that I love it? I would definitely buy. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Great but missing the inner dewy core
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from BzzAgent to test and review. I love the blush, but I think mine is missing the inner core? It's very pigmented but also can be blended out with your finger or a sponge to look more natural. It's also very creamy but once blended out it doesn't keep it's shine. I have oily skin so that is great. I wonder how the dewy core would work on my skin because the blush itself without it works great on my skin!

reviews.review_title: Cool product, just not on the eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the colour payoff of the blush. Its not too concentrated and gives me a bit of a neutral rose which is good for a daytime look. The shimmer portion is more subtle, which I prefer. However, Itried it on my eyelidsu2026its pretty subpar. The colour moves around when I open my eyes and creates lines of build up colour. Thats just messy. Otherwise, decent product.

reviews.review_title: Convenient highlighter and blush in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a blush hoarder and lately, I've only been reaching for cream blushes. I love nudestix! Their stuff is almost always a hit and this was no different. The cream blush is moist with a bit of a glow and easy to apply. So convenient for on-the-go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to BzzAgent, I was gifted with a free sample of NUDESTIX Nudies Matte + Glow Core All Over Face Plumping Peptide Blush in exchange for my honest review. I received the Sunset Glow colour to try and I am so happy that it blends well with my slightly tan skin colour. I like its creamy texture and ease of application throughout the face in a convenient stick format. It is a versatile product where you have various choices on how you can apply the product, such as using a brush, sponge, or even your fingers. After application, I noticed that my skin looks nourished and I appreciate its compact size that makes it easy to bring whenever I am outside or travelling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush so much. it's buildable and the peach pearl is perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product generally speaking. The color is great and I can easily diffuse it with my finger or a brush. I'm not ready to champion this product over a good old blush and highlighter (seperated). The matte and glow combo in one stick isn't a winner for me. This is my first cream blush, so it's difficult to compare with another cream product, but comparing with a powder blush, it's easier to diffuse. I notice that this product is good just on its own on a light make up type of day. The reason it got 3 starts it's because it's a stick! You can't apply this product on top of fondaction, or cc cream without removing it! Yes, I can brush the top of the stick on a brush and then apply it, but then, it all melts into one color. I could compare it with the Cream version of the Milani  bake blush which is one of my favorite blush out there.  I wouldn't buy it again as I also notice how easy it is for it to kinda melt or break. I had to push it back in with my finger. I would recommend this product to my less experience friends or for people on the go. It's such a easy product to just apply, place with the finger and leave. Just don't apply makeup under it lol!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very buildable blush. Creamy formula goes on smooth and with the shimmery centre gives that 'glowing from within' look. I tried a few different application methods. What worked best for me was to pick up product with a brush and apply. You could use fingers, sponge, or dabbing it directly on to your cheekbones then blending with a brush. I also liked using the outer circle on its own on my lips for a matching look.

reviews.review_title: A new part of my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is super pale, the rose glow shade is so pretty on my skin. Most blushes show up super pink on me, but this colour is so natural and flattering. I apply it straight to my cheeks and then blend it out with my fingers and I find that this method works the best for my oily skin. I would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a buildable, neutral blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! perfect for easy on the go travel makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream blush! It applies so nicely and the colour is beautiful and lasting - with great buildable coverage. I love how dewy & glowy it looks and my skin feels hydrated underneath. Also looks beautiful as a lip colour!

reviews.review_title: This is whats missing from your everyday routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After incorporating this product into my every day routine, I dont know how I did without it. My skin LOVES this formula and its so easy to use. All together, so compact I could easily keep it in any of my purses for any quick touch ups I needed between coffee breaks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as someone who is at a very beginner level when it comes to makeup, I love this product! I never really used blush before, mostly because i simply didnt really know how to. But with this stick it makes it so easy and natural-looking! Definitely will be keeping this around for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: loved it very much..the shade is sooo good and perfect on my skin...the highlighter effect is perfect..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this blush! I find that products that are advertised as radiant often really show my textured skin but i didnt have that experience with this blush. Its super easy to blend out and looks really flattering on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush/all over blush! I use it on my cheeks, eyes and lips. Has a really nice glowing effect and stays in place. I would recommend if your looking for a multipurpose blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudies Matte + Glow Core All Over Face Plumping Peptide Blush was so smooth and glided on easily. It is a cream outer blush with inner glow core. It provides a dewy glow. It is a great formula as well with Peptides, ceramides, and Vit E. It is a matte finish and sephora clean seal approved. The magenta magic was very bright but easily able to blend in to make it less dramatic if wanted. It looked beautiful as eyeshadow however probably need to reapply with blush if looking for long lasting as I did notice the colour faded. I enjoy how versatile it is and the colour is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Versatile addition to my make-up purse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product for free as part of the review. My color was rose glow. Loved the product because it is very versatile: can use it for some blush on your cheeks, tint for the lips or even eye shadow. The weather is getting colder now and I opted for some color on top of my foundation. Looked very nice. I also appreciated that the product has a glow core which means you can skip that white highlighter that one generally adds as a final touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.   This cream blush comes in a compact, lightweight tube that can easily fit most places. The cap is secure and does not fall off when thrown into a purse. I also like that the cap reflects the colour of the product inside.  I would describe the product itself as a skin-like or satin finish. It stays creamy on your skin and is very pigmented, so a little goes a long way. I am fair-light in complexion with combination-oily skin and I only need a little dab on each cheek when I use the Peach Pearl colour. It blends out very easily, I prefer to use a slightly fluffy flat brush or standard cream blush brush. The end result looks incredibly natural and you cant tell thats its not my own natural flush.  The staying power is quite good, better than other high-end cream blushes that dont dry down. It wears well through my 12 hour shifts but does transfer off slightly when wearing a mask.   Id say its overall its a solid product, more reasonably priced than a lot of whats on the market nowadays and most makeup wearers would be pleased with it. Obviously this is not a product for people who want/need matte finish or transfer-proof makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives great, long-lasting colour! A little goes a long way so I can see this product lasting a long time. Wish it had more shimmer, as it kind of gets lost in the blush colour. A new staple in my makeup bag!

Its a great additional to any makeup kit and fantastic to throw in your bag when youre on the go.

reviews.review_title: Radiant Glow with Nudestix Matte+Glow Core Blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received this product free for review. I decided to wear it over the course of an evening, which included going out for dinner and spending some time outside.   When applying this product I loved how creamy and blendable it was, however I was not impressed by the colour payoff. I expected the magenta shade to give more of a pop, but it took quite a lot of layering to achieve the desired effect. Keep in mind, I am not a heavy blush user. I did enjoy the glow the product gave me. It wasn't too sparkly or greasy looking, just a nice hydrated sheen.   Given the lacklustre colour payoff, I was surprised that this blush lasted all evening. I did layer it on top of foundation and under setting spray, however I didn't powder it.   In terms of the skincare benefit, I honestly find it quite gimmicky for products like this. In makeup products, most skincare treatment-type ingredients end up much too diluted to do much of anything. Even if there was enough peptide to really make a difference, I am only applying it to a small part of my face in low quantities, and nowhere near consistently enough to produce or maintain any benefit. I understand that skincare claims in makeup products sell well these days, but it is just disingenuous to me.   That being said, I will wear this again, because the overall effect is quite pretty and I was surprised at how well it lasted on my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the colour Sunset Gold to review.  When I first opened the package I was surprised at how little the product was. I wasnt familiar with the launch and expected something more like the regular cream blushes in the line. You are getting one gram less of actual product and there is no attached brush. The component itself feels very light and a little cheap in my opinion. For $34 I would expect something more substantial, but on the other hand the lightweight packaging makes this ideal for travel.  Onto the product, this blush is pigmented! A little goes a very long way. Rather than swiping the product directly onto the cheeks, I prefer to use a brush to grab some product and then slowly build up the colour since this can get into clown-cheek territory very fast. When it comes to the u201cglow coreu201d I cant really say that I notice much effect. It provides no noticeable shimmer or glitter and as for skincare benefits, I apply so little and to only a small portion of my face that even if something were happening, I dont think I would be able to see any results. I have a very oily skin type so I always powder over top of this with a translucent setting powder. Because of this, I cant speak to the products dewiness claims.  Overall, this is a good blush product if you are looking for a highly pigment blush stick with possible skincare benefits.

reviews.review_text: So, I received this product in exchange for an honest review, and they sent me the shade Pink Ice. I like that it spreads very evenly, and there's no feeling of cakiness/oiliness whatsoever. I also like that you can build the colour to be however strong you'd like it to be. I personally didnt notice a ton of payout with the highlighter part, but I personally don't like very prominent highlighter, so I was fine with this. I've attached a pic to show what the highlighter core actually looks like.  The one negative I will say is that I didn't find it to be very lon glasting. Again, this may be related to me preferring a more subtle colour so not putting too much on to begin with, but I do wish it wouldn't absorb into the skin too quickly. I'd definitely recommend if you want a blush thats not so bold, but maybe look elsewhere if subtle or natural isn't your thing.

reviews.review_title: Sunset Gold - a surprisingly natural look blush!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary Nudestix blush in the sunset gold color in exchange for a review.  I was pleasantly surprised by this blush and am looking forward to seeing the other colors on my next trip to Sephora. My skin is quite pale with yellow undertones (1w1 in Estee Lauder and 12y in Sephora brand foundation) so its hard to find a blush that doesn't look too obnoxious or unflattering when actually applied. This is why I was so shocked when I tried this Nudestix blush. The color is quite vibrant in the tube and when you first apply it, but It actually blends beautifully, particularly when paired with contour powder. It provides a buildable coverage and a little goes a long way particularly if you are pale and looking for a more natural look like me. Even when applying a small amount the gold glow core brightens up your face to provide subtle but fresh look. I've been using this blush with the Sephora brand setting spray every day for the last week and consistently gotten all day wear without the need for touch ups. I've only used it as a blush so far but am looking forward to experimenting with it more.  If you're on the fence I totally recommend you give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this as highlighter on my cheeks and its very pigmented. Its easy to apply, and I love the tube that it comes in. I was really impressed when I opened it and saw how beautiful the colours are. It doesnt fade away or rub off that easily either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the undertone of this on my light medium olive skin! I knocked off a star because I wish the glow core packed more of a punch; I personally prefer very glowy blushes that I can use as a 2-in-1 for highlight as well. Other than that small complaint the formula is quintessential Nudestixu2026 buttery smooth and highly pigmented! The packaging is truly an upgrade from the bulky tin their line usually comes in and it feels compact, sleek and durable thrown around in a makeup bag. Will most likely purchase the shade u2018Rose Glow for the cooler months leading into winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me a natural, sun-kissed flush which I like for everyday makeup. There is a bit of glitter from the glow core but its not too shimmery. It blended easily with fingers or a brush and is buildable if you want more noticeable color. I have oily skin and often find cream products just melt away throughout the day, but could still see the flush after 8 hours. After two years working from home and barely wearing makeup, I like the ease of use and the natural glow it gives. A quick swipe, a few dabs of my finger to blend, and I actually look alive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using my Mac blush for over 7 years now as I could never find a perfect match until I came across this color. I have also been looking for cream blush and this is perfect!! I've also been getting a lot of compliments about my blush/highlight and people are surprised that it's literally one product. I also just do it in my purse for a touch-up and since it's a compact size it's perfect. I love this and have already bought another shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this nudestix stick from bzzagent to try and give review. I really love this blush its so creamy and pigmented. am using it from last 2 weeks as blush and really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this blush is glowy and it is buildable :) the shade u201csunset goldu201d comes on as a peachy/salmon pink and can be built up to an almost red shade (a warm / peachy red). Its a really pretty colour ud83eudd70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received it in return of my honest review.I am mommy of toddler and its very hard fir me to give time for make up.I used this nude site magenta blush it instantly gives plump and freshness to my face.It gives natural glow.I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the colour Rose Glow, and it gives off such a natural hue for everyday looks. Though not the texture is not unique, but this is one of the most creamy blushes that I've used. This product is pigmented and goes on smoothly and blends well and quickly in to the skin. It gives off a dewy glowy finish. I would purchase this product in the future, and strongly recommend! Thanks #BzzAgent for letting me try this awesome product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour, can be a subtle wash of color or built up very bright. Would be five stars however the highlight in the center does not create a super noticeable glow if that is something you are looking for. Very comparable to a more cream version of the blush sticks they already carry.
